articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Machine Plant
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the machine plant managed by Kang Thae Ho.
					 Kim Jong Un first looked round its e-library.
					
					 He was pleased to see a centre for disseminating science and technology, noting that it was built very well as intended by the party and it was impeccable in all aspects as it had up-to-date equipment sent by the party.
					
					 It has become possible for scientists, technicians and workers to steadily raise the level of their technical skill and broaden their outlook as the plant has established a network system not only with various scientific research institutions but also with well-known universities so that they may get access to data of cutting-edge science and technology on a regular basis, he noted.
					
					 Then he went round the designing room, processing and assembling shops and other places.
					
					 It is necessary for the plant to give definite priority to the scientific researches to keep the production going at a high rate and improve the quality of products, he said, setting the goal to be attained by it for researching and developing machine products, indicating the orientation of research work and underscoring the need to strengthen the scientific technological force by successfully building a think tank.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the work to produce precise, light and intellectual products at the plant and stressed the need to manufacture all products to be of the best quality so they might be favored by users.
					
					 Learning about the use of the geothermal cooling and heating equipment introduced by the plant, he said that the plant set an example in carrying out the WPK's policy on widely using natural energy.
					
					 He expressed hope that officials, scientists, technicians and workers of the plant would bring about a steady boost in the production by making a dynamic drive for breaking through the cutting edge with the resolution to put the nation's machine-building industry on a world level through campaigns of brains and technology. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Greetings to Tunisian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian President
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Al Moncef Al Marzouki, president of Tunisia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely wishing the president and people of Tunisia bigger successes in their work to achieve the security, stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Tunisian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian PM
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mehdi Jomaa, prime minister of Tunisia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the prime minister and government of Tunisia big success in their work to achieve economic development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Tunisian counterpart Mongi Hamdi on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae Meets Special Envoy of Chinese Government
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets Special Envoy of Chinese Government 
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) ? Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Wu Dawei, special envoy of the Chinese government for the affairs of the Korean peninsula, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Held
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba was held here Thursday.
					 Present there were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission who doubles as chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and members of the committee.
					
					 Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and his embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work done by the committee over the past one year to boost the friendship and solidarity with the fraternal Cuban people in their dynamic struggle to protect the sovereignty and socialist gains of the country, courageously frustrating the sanctions and blockade of the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of the Communist Party of Cuba. 
					
					 It also discussed a working plan to boost the bonds of militant friendship and cooperation between the two countries this year.

articles.title: DPRK Friendship Visiting Group Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship Visiting Group Back Home
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The friendship visiting group of the State General Bureau of Tourism of the DPRK headed by Vice Director General Jo Song Gol Thursday came back home after visiting China.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) ? The participants in the fourth national technological innovation exhibition of the three-revolution teams visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues and paid high tribute to them.

articles.title: 1st Session of 13th SPA to Be Convened
articles.content:
1st Session of 13th SPA to Be Convened
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK will be convened in Pyongyang on April 9, Juche 103 (2014), according to a decree of the Presidium of the SPA on Wednesday.

articles.title: Fourth National Technological Innovation Exhibition of Three-Revolution Teams Opens
articles.content:
Fourth National Technological Innovation Exhibition of Three-Revolution Teams Opens
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) - The fourth national technological innovation exhibition of the three-revolution teams Thursday was opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House.
					 Displayed in the exhibition were more than 3 200 products of over 2000 varieties showing the successes members of the three-revolution teams have made by boosting creative cooperation with scientists, technicians and workers in various fields.
					
					 Present there were Kim Phyong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials of commissions, ministries, national institutions and relevant units, exemplary members of the three-revolution teams and officials of the units which dispatched the teams to different units.
					
					At the end of the ceremony, they looked round the venue of the exhibition.

articles.title: 10DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the DPRK Olympic Committee took place Thursday.
					 Present there were members of the committee and officials in the field of physical culture and sports and the relevant fields. 
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work done by the committee last year and discussed the orientation of its work for this year. 
					
					 A report by Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports who doubles as chairman of the committee, was followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un indicated orientation and ways for the development of sports and showed so warm loving care for those sportspersons who exalted the honor of the country that they will remember it generation after generation. 
					
					 They referred to the fact that the DPRK players made successes in the international games.
					
					 They called for dynamically raising a strong wind of mass sports across the country, channeling great efforts into the development of technique in various sports events and boosting cooperation with international sports bodies to register greater successes in the nation's sports.

articles.title: New Kind of Koryo Medicine Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Koryo Medicine Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Radioactive Rays Medicine Institute under the Academy of Medical Science in the DPRK recently developed a chitosan Eleutherococcus dragee.
					 This Koryo medicine is made of over 90-percent chitosan from shell of crustacea (crab and lobster) and extract from roots of Eleutherococcus senticosus. Those substances have a special virtue for preventing damage from radioactive rays and raising immunity.
					
					 According to Pak Hak Il, a section chief of the Institute, the dragee has been applied to clinical treatment after testing its pharmacological action.
					
					 This medicine is efficacious for many diseases like cancer, hypertension, cerebral thrombosis, cardiovascular disease, tuberculosis, gastric and duodenal ulcers, skin disease and heavy metal poisoning as well as prevention of damage from radioactive rays. Especially, it has diverse functions for physiological regulation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Fixed Will for National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Fixed Will for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- It is the firm resolve and will of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, to build a unified thriving state in the Korean Peninsula, true to the lifelong intention and behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 In March Juche 101 (2012) Kim Jong Un toured Panmunjom to give strength and courage to all the fellow countrymen desirous of national reunification.
					
					 This inspection was a historic event demonstrating that he, the brilliant Songun (military-first) commander identical to the Generalissimos in pluck and courage, is standing in the van of the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 Cherishing his mission for national reunification, he expressed his fixed will for reunification in a speech made at the military parade celebrating the centenary of Kim Il Sung's birth and in several famous works.
					
					 The supreme leader clarified that the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government would join hands with anyone who truly wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation and make responsible and persistent efforts for carrying out the historic cause of national reunification. This reflected his noble love for the nation and will for reunification based on the responsibility for the destiny and prospect of the country and the nation.
					
					 His patriotic will to surely realize the lifelong desire of the Generalissimos is also manifested in edifices built in the DPRK.   When visiting the Pyongyang Folklore Park before its operation, he said that a miniature of Panmunjom, symbolic of the national division, should be made at the Park so as to make its visitors harden their resolve to reunify the country at any cost.
					
					 In his New Year Address, Kim Jong Un called for bringing a fresh progress in the national reunification movement, true to the behests of the Generalissimos, this year marking the 20th anniversary of Kim Il Sung's last signature on a historic document concerning the country's reunification.
					
					 In response to this call, the DPRK advanced important proposals for improving the north-south relations by united efforts of the Koreans and sent an open letter to the authorities, political parties, social organizations and people of various circles in south Korea.
					
					 Now the Korean people are filled with confidence in the reunification of the country as they have Kim Jong Un as the sun of the nation and the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Three-Revolution Team Members to Be Standard-bearers of Industrial Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Three-Revolution Team Members to Be Standard-bearers of Industrial Revolution
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially calls upon the three-revolution team members to be scouts and standard-bearers of the industrial revolution in the new century.
					 The Workers' Party of Korea is now expecting the three-revolution teams to greatly contribute to carrying out the industrial revolution in the new century, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 When the three-revolution team members full of youthful ambition and vigor, responsive to what is new and enterprising, conduct a dynamic drive for pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology at all worksites for building an economic giant, a great turn will take place in carrying on the industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					 Very important are the responsibility and role of the three-revolution team members in making the socialist self-supporting national economy of the DPRK radically change its appearance to suit the era of knowledge-based economy by thoroughly applying the great party's idea of pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology.
					
					 The three-revolution team members should become masters of technological innovations and rationalization proposals and forerunners of the drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology through a vigorous campaign of technology and brains. This is a sure guarantee for putting machines, equipment and production processes on a modern basis and effecting a great surge in production in all sectors of the national economy.
					
					 In his historic work "Let Us Bring About Fresh Turn in Work of Three-Revolution Teams as Required by New Situation" published last year marking the 40th anniversary of the start of the three-revolution team movement, supreme leader Kim Jong Un said that the three-revolution team members should become scouts and standard-bearers of the industrial revolution in the new century in stepping up the building of an economic giant by dint of science and technology.
					
					 The editorial calls upon the three-revolution team members to push ahead with the industrial revolution in the new century in the van of the on-going general advance, bearing in mind the ideas and theories set forth in his work.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Smear Campaign against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a joint statement titled "Anti-reunification confrontation maniacs, stop at once smear campaign against their fellow countrymen" on March 15.
					 Yu Song Ok, director of the Institute for Security Strategy under the Intelligence Service of south Korea, let loose a spate of vituperations malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The fact that such reckless remarks were made at a formal meeting of the coterie of lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" proves that this was a prearranged scenario.
					
					 The recent wild remarks are last-ditch efforts of the south Korean conservative group to undermine the single-minded unity of the service personnel and the people around Marshal Kim Jong Un which has become unbreakable through the election of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, and tarnish the image of the DPRK. They are nothing but a spasm of the mentally deranged to besmirch with their dirty hands the bright image of the Marshal whom the people laud as a legendary hero.
					
					 They are, at the same time, acts of openly reneging on the agreement made at the north-south high-level contact on putting an end to the smear campaign against the other party and blatantly challenging it.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have true intent to build confidence and improve the north-south relations, they should make sure that the architects of the smear campaign apologize for the recent serious provocation and take measures against the recurrence of such clumsy mud-slinging.
					
					 The statement stressed that the south Korean authorities should know that there is a limit to the patience on the part of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Threats to DPRK Censured by Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Threats to DPRK Censured by Koreans in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- An article accusing the U.S. of its nuclear threats to the DPRK was posted by the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany on its website on March 15.
					 The article referred to the fact that the U.S. let a formation of B-52s fly into the sky above Jik islet in the West Sea of Korea for a drill for nuclear strike at the north at a time when an agreement on the reunion of separated families and their relatives from the north and the south was reaching at Panmunjom early in February.
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 Such provocative act lays bare the real intention of the U.S. displeased with improved north-south relations. It also goes to clearly prove who is the chief culprit bringing a nuclear war crisis to the Korean peninsula and blocking the settlement of the nuclear issue.
					
					 The command of the U.S. Air Force in the Pacific region made an excuse to quell the public sentiments but it only revealed the deceptive and provocative true colors of the U.S. engrossed in the reckless nuclear blackmail and threats to the north while crying out for the "nuclear issue of the north".
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has fostered the danger of a nuclear war to spawn the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and desperately blocked its settlement.
					
					 The U.S. should make an apology for the nuclear issue before the Korean nation and the international community and stop their nuclear blackmail and threats as it has no qualification and face to find fault with the north.
					
					 If the U.S. sincerely wants peace and settlement of the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula, it should stop its reckless nuclear rackets against the DPRK including the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed in Russia 
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Russian public circles for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Moscow on March 13. 
					 The preparatory committee comprises prominent public figures of Russia with Chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK V. A. Petrov as its chairman. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold such colorful political and cultural events as meeting, seminar and photo exhibition praising the noble revolutionary life and undying feats of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Sofia on Mar. 13.
					 The chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to give wide publicity to the undying feats of the President and organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the significant Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Maquinas encabezada por Kang Thae Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Maquinas encabezada por Kang Thae Ho
						
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas donde trabaja Kang Thae Ho.
					Estuvo primero en la biblioteca electronica.
					
					Se mostro alegre diciendo que este edificio se ha construido perfectamente conforme a la voluntad del partido como base de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas dotada de los equipos ultramodernos enviados por el partido.
					
					Dijo que se formo un sistema de red con los organos de investigacion cientifica y las universidades famosas que permiten ver normalmente los datos sobre las ciencias y tecnicas ultimas, asi que los cientificos, tecnicos y obreros pudieran elevar el nivel tecnico y de calificacion y ampliar sus visiones.
					
					Luego, el Mariscal recorrio la sala de diseno, el lugar de fabricacion y montaje y otros puntos.
					
					Senalo que para normalizar la produccion y mejorar la calidad, hay que anteponer la investigacion cientifica. Tras definir la meta de la fabrica en el desarrollo de los articulos de maquinaria y aclarar el rumbo de las investigaciones, instruyo la necesidad de fortalecer las fuerzas cientificas y tecnicas con los cerebros.
					
					Al cabo de reconocer el estado de alto precision, aligeramiento e inteligencia de los productos, enfatizo que todos los articulos deben ser fabricados a nivel maximo para que ganen reputacion entre los usuarios.
					
					Luego de averiguar el estado de uso de las instalaciones geotermicas de enfriamiento y calefaccion, aplicadas en la fabrica, evaluo que esta es ejemplar en la materializacion de la orientacion  del partido de utilizar ampliamente las energias naturales.
					
					Expreso expectativa de que los funcionarios, cientificos,  tecnicos y obreros de la fabrica registren el auge continuo en la produccion con el esfuerzo cerebral y tecnico por alcanzar el nivel de talla mundial en la industria de construccion de maquinaria y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente tunecino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente tunecino
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Dia Nacional de la Republica Tunecina, Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de ese pais, Al Moncef Al Marzouki.
					Convencido de que seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises, el remitente deseo de todo corazon notables exitos en los trabajos del destinatario y el pueblo tunecino por lograr la seguridad, la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico del pais.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
						
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, So Ho Won, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, y los miembros del comite solidario.
					
					Asistieron ademas el embajador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez y otros integrantes de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea.
					
					La reunion hizo balance de lo que hizo el comite durante un ano transcurrido por profundizar la amistad y solidaridad con el hermano pueblo cubano que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de Cuba, lucha intensamente por defender la soberania del pais y las conquistas del socialismo frustrando la campana de bloqueo y sancion del imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Discutio el plan de trabajo para seguir consolidando este ano tambien los lazos de amistad combativa y cooperacion entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Embajador ruso ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador ruso ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la firma del convenio sobre la cooperacion economica y cultural entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa, el embajador ruso en Corea Alexandr Timonin ofrecio el dia 19 un banquete en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el vicepremier Kang Sok Ju, el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia y vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jin Bom, y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada rusa en Corea.
					
					Alexandr Timonin dijo en su discurso que hace ahora 65 anos la firma del convenio sobre la colaboracion economico-cultural entre los dos paises fue un importante evento historico que dio el inicio a la cooperacion multilateral entre ambas partes.
					
					Enfatizo que en el nuevo siglo, el principio de cooperacion beneficiosa, base del convenio se ha reflejado en el acuerdo de los lideres de ambos paises y mantenido con firmeza.
					
					Deseo a los amigos de Corea exitos en la labor para fortalecer el poderio estatal.
					
					Kang Sok Ju recordo que durante los 65 anos pasados que datan de la firma del convenio, los dos paises han desarrollado las relaciones bilaterales a traves de la cooperacion economica y multilateral intercambio cultural.
					
					Senalo que bajo la profunda atencion de los maximos dirigentes de los dos paises, en estos dias las relaciones Corea-Rusia se desarrollan favorablemente en varios sectores incluidas la politica, la economia y la cultura.
					
					Afirmo que seguiran marchando mano a mano con los amigos rusos para el fortalecimiento de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad Corea-Rusia.

articles.title: Se convocara en RPDC la asamblea popular suprema
articles.content:
Se convocara en RPDC la asamblea popular suprema
						
　Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto fechado 12 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se convocara el 9 de abril del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche en esta capital el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC.
